Smart home control system accepts commands from the user in order to control gadget. For garage, you can say garage open, garage close or garage status. For porchlight, you can say light on, light off or light status. For radio, you can say radio on, radio off or radio status, or say set station. For living room thermostat, you can say living room thermostat status, increase or decrease living room temperature, or up or down living room temperature. For main bedroom thermostat, you can say main bedroom thermostat status, increase or decrease main bedroom temperature, or up or down main bedroom temperature. For second bedroom thermostat, you can say second bedroom thermostat status, increase or decrease second bedroom temperature, or up or down second bedroom temperature. For dining room thermostat, you can say dining room thermostat status, increase or decrease dining room temperature, or up or down dining room temperature.
Thanks for using smart home control system.
